text: V tot Den', kogda litsemery i litsemerki skazhut veruyushchim muzhchinam i veruyushchim zhenshchinam: "Podozhdite nas, chtoby nam dostalas' dolya vashego Sveta!" - no im v poritsaniye skazhut: "Vernites' tuda, otkuda my poluchili etot Svet i tam voz'mite yego!" I mezhdu veruyushchimi i litsemerami vozdvignuta stena s vratami, vnutrennyaya chast' kotoroy (so storony raya) - miloserdiye i blazhenstvo, a yeyo naruzhnaya chast' (so storony adskogo ognya) - kara i nakazaniye
